de.dfki.adom.rest

Interface APIObserver


  • public interface APIObserver
    Watches over an API and is notified about any changes to the represented object memory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyBlockIDs(java.lang.String response)
      Notifies this observer about a getBlockIDs-request including its response.
      void notifyDeleteBlock(boolean response, java.lang.String blockID)
      Notifies this observer about a deleteBlock-request including its response and the block's ID.
      void notifyDeletePayload(boolean response, java.lang.String blockID)
      Notifies this observer about a deletePayload-request including its response and the block's ID.
      void notifyFeatureNegotiation(java.lang.String response)
      Notifies this observer about a getFeatureNegotiation-request including its response.
      void notifyMeta(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String blockID)
      Notifies this observer about a getMeta-request including its response and the block's ID.
      void notifyMetaAttribute(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String blockID, MetaAttribute metaAttribute)
      Notifies this observer about a getMetaAttribute-request including its response, the block's ID and the MetaAttribute.
      void notifyPayload(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String blockID)
      Notifies this observer about a getPayload-request including its response and the block's ID.
      void notifyPayloadEncoding(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String blockID)
      Notifies this observer about a getPayloadEncoding-request including its response and the block's ID.
      void notifyPostBlock(java.lang.String response, java.lang.String blockAsXMLSnipped)
      Notifies this observer about a postBlock-request including its response and the posted block's data.
      void notifyPostMetaAttribute(boolean response, java.lang.String blockID, MetaAttribute metaAttribute, java.lang.String attribXMLSnipped)
      Notifies this observer about a postMetaAttribute-request including its response, the block's ID, the MetaAttribute and the posted data.
      void notifyPostPayload(boolean response, java.lang.String blockID, java.lang.String payload)
      Notifies this observer about a postPayload-request including its response, the block's ID and the posted payload.
      void notifyTableOfContents(java.lang.String response)
      Notifies this observer about a getToC-request including its response.
